verses.verse: A false <S%H4820><s%> balance <S%H3976><s%> is an abomination <S%H8441><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> but accurate <S%H8003><s%> weights <S%H68><s%> are his delight. <S%H7522><s%>
When pride <S%H2087><s%> comes, <S%H935><s%> then comes <S%H935><s%> shame, <S%H7036><s%> but with humility comes <S%H935><s%> wisdom. <S%H2451><s%>
The integrity <S%H8538><s%> of the upright <S%H3477><s%> shall guide <S%H5148><s%> them, <S%H5558><s%> but the perverseness of the treacherous <S%H898><s%> shall destroy them. <S%H7703><s%>
Riches <S%H1952><s%> don't <S%H3276><s%> profit in the day <S%H3117><s%> of wrath, <S%H5678><s%> but righteousness <S%H6666><s%> delivers <S%H5337><s%> from death. <S%H4194><s%>

The righteousness <S%H6666><s%> of the blameless <S%H8549><s%> will direct <S%H3474><s%> his way, <S%H1870><s%> but the wicked <S%H7563><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%> by his own wickedness. <S%H7564><s%>
The righteousness <S%H6666><s%> of the upright <S%H3477><s%> shall deliver <S%H5337><s%> them, <S%H898><s%> but the unfaithful will be trapped <S%H3920><s%> by evil desires. <S%H1942><s%>
When a wicked <S%H7563><s%> man <S%H120><s%> dies, <S%H4194><s%> hope <S%H8615><s%> perishes, <S%H6><s%> and expectation <S%H8615><s%> of power <S%H205><s%> comes to nothing. <S%H6><s%>
A righteous <S%H6662><s%> person is delivered out <S%H2502><s%> of trouble, <S%H6869><s%> and the wicked <S%H7563><s%> takes his place. <S%H7563><s%>

With his mouth <S%H6310><s%> the godless <S%H2611><s%> man destroys <S%H7843><s%> his neighbor, <S%H7453><s%> but the righteous <S%H6662><s%> will be delivered <S%H2502><s%> through knowledge. <S%H1847><s%>
When it goes well <S%H2898><s%> with the righteous, <S%H6662><s%> the city <S%H7151><s%> rejoices. <S%H5970><s%> When the wicked <S%H7563><s%> perish, <S%H6><s%> there is shouting. <S%H7440><s%>
By the blessing <S%H1293><s%> of the upright, <S%H3477><s%> the city <S%H7176><s%> is exalted, <S%H7311><s%> but it is overthrown <S%H2040><s%> by the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the wicked. <S%H7563><s%>
One who despises <S%H936><s%> his neighbor <S%H7453><s%> is void <S%H2638><s%> of wisdom, <S%H3820><s%> but a man <S%H376><s%> of understanding <S%H8394><s%> holds his peace. <S%H2790><s%>

One who brings gossip <S%H1980><s%> betrays <S%H1540><s%> a confidence, <S%H5475><s%> but one who is of a trustworthy <S%H539><s%> spirit <S%H7307><s%> is one who keeps <S%H3680><s%> a secret. <S%H1697><s%>
Where there is no wise guidance, <S%H8458><s%> the nation <S%H5971><s%> falls, <S%H5307><s%> but in the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of counselors <S%H3289><s%> there is victory. <S%H8668><s%>
He who is collateral <S%H6148><s%> for a stranger <S%H2114><s%> will suffer <S%H7321><s%> for it, <S%H8130><s%> but he who refuses pledges of collateral <S%H8628><s%> is secure. <S%H982><s%>
A gracious <S%H2580><s%> woman <S%H802><s%> obtains <S%H8551><s%> honor, <S%H3519><s%> but violent <S%H6184><s%> men obtain <S%H8551><s%> riches. <S%H6239><s%>
The merciful <S%H2617><s%> man <S%H376><s%> does good <S%H1580><s%> to his own soul, <S%H5315><s%> but he who is cruel <S%H394><s%> troubles <S%H5916><s%> his own flesh. <S%H7607><s%>
Wicked <S%H7563><s%> people earn <S%H6213><s%> deceitful <S%H8267><s%> wages, <S%H6468><s%> but one who sows <S%H2232><s%> righteousness <S%H6666><s%> reaps a sure <S%H571><s%> reward. <S%H7938><s%>
He who is truly righteous <S%H6666><s%> gets life. <S%H2416><s%> He who pursues <S%H7291><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> gets death. <S%H4194><s%>

Those who are perverse <S%H6141><s%> in heart <S%H3820><s%> are an abomination <S%H8441><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> but those whose ways <S%H1870><s%> are blameless <S%H8549><s%> are his delight. <S%H7522><s%>
Most <S%H3027><s%> certainly, <S%H3027><s%> the evil <S%H7451><s%> man will not be unpunished, <S%H5352><s%> but the seed <S%H2233><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> will be delivered. <S%H4422><s%>
Like a gold <S%H2091><s%> ring <S%H5141><s%> in a pig <S%H2386><s%>'s snout, <S%H639><s%> is a beautiful <S%H3303><s%> woman <S%H802><s%> who lacks <S%H5493><s%> discretion. <S%H2940><s%>
The desire <S%H8378><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> is only good. <S%H2896><s%> The expectation <S%H8615><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> is wrath. <S%H5678><s%>
There is <S%H3426><s%> one who scatters, <S%H6340><s%> and increases <S%H3254><s%> yet more. <S%H3476><s%> There is one who withholds more than is appropriate, but gains poverty. <S%H4270><s%>
The liberal <S%H1293><s%> soul <S%H5315><s%> shall be made fat. <S%H1878><s%> He who waters <S%H7301><s%> shall be watered also himself. <S%H3384><s%>
People <S%H3816><s%> curse <S%H5344><s%> someone who withholds <S%H4513><s%> grain, <S%H1250><s%> but blessing <S%H1293><s%> will be on the head <S%H7218><s%> of him who sells it. <S%H7666><s%>
He who diligently seeks <S%H7836><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> seeks <S%H7836><s%> favor, <S%H7522><s%> but he who searches <S%H1875><s%> after evil, <S%H7451><s%> it shall come to him. <S%H935><s%>
He who trusts <S%H982><s%> in his riches <S%H6239><s%> will fall, <S%H5307><s%> but the righteous <S%H6662><s%> shall flourish <S%H6524><s%> as the green leaf. <S%H5929><s%>

He who troubles <S%H5916><s%> his own house <S%H1004><s%> shall inherit <S%H5157><s%> the wind. <S%H7307><s%> The foolish <S%H191><s%> shall be servant <S%H5650><s%> to the wise <S%H2450><s%> of heart. <S%H3820><s%>
The fruit <S%H6529><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> is a tree <S%H6086><s%> of life. <S%H2416><s%> He who is wise <S%H2450><s%> wins <S%H3947><s%> souls. <S%H5315><s%>
Behold, <S%H6662><s%> the righteous shall be repaid <S%H7999><s%> in the earth; <S%H776><s%> how much more the wicked <S%H7563><s%> and the sinner! <S%H2398><s%>
